# Function
a gene that encodes the copper-zinc superoxide dismutase enzyme @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019

# Mutation
one of 100s of mutations in SOD1 have been linked to hereditary ALS @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019.
